announcements.title: The Cathedral is Re-Opening!
announcements.descriptive:
Our schedule will be updated during the process of re-opening.
Be sure to
[join our mailing list](https://mailchi.mp/ac8e8cadb5e8/dont-miss-out)
for the latest updates as they happen!

Parishioners are asked to review
[Worship Safe in Pictures and Points](https://www.peterboroughdiocese.org/en/resourcesGeneral/Homepage-banners/COVID-19/Worship-Safe/Final-Worship-Safe-in-Pictures-and-Points.pdf).

The televised Sunday Mass will continue on Cogeco Cable and on YouTube.
Check [Special events](#schedule2) below for information and links.

announcements.title: Ushers needed!
announcements.descriptive:
We are calling for volunteers to assist as ushers inside The Cathedral
during Holy Mass and with cleaning between Masses.

**Needed are a minimum of four ushers.**

Training, masks, and gloves will be provided.
Volunteers will be asked to sign a waiver.

We need **you**!
Many thanks to all those who step forward!

announcements.title: Join our mailing list
announcements.descriptive:
Be the first to know!
Stay in the loop with everything going on at The Cathedral.

Sign up to receive regular updates, announcements, links to bulletins, and more,
delivered straight to your inbox!

Let's stay connected.

[Sign up...](https://mailchi.mp/ac8e8cadb5e8/dont-miss-out)

regularEvents.title: Weekday Mass
regularEvents.descriptive:
For parishioners who wish to begin or punctuate their day in faith and praise.

Parishioners are asked to review
[Worship Safe in Pictures and Points](https://www.peterboroughdiocese.org/en/resourcesGeneral/Homepage-banners/COVID-19/Worship-Safe/Final-Worship-Safe-in-Pictures-and-Points.pdf)
during this time of re-opening.

specialEvents.title: Sunday Mass
specialEvents.subtitle: 14th Sunday in Ordinary Time
specialEvents.descriptive:
Celebrated at The Cathedral by Bishop Daniel Miehm,
this very special Mass airs on **Channel 10 and 700**
on Cogeco Cable and will be available on YouTube.

[View this Mass on YouTube…](https://youtu.be/yzohb4lgSzo)
